fetchLatestPosition(int256,uint256,uint2.notice: fetches the latest user position after a liquidation

readFromStorage(bytes32).notice: reads uint256 data `result_` from storage at a bytes32 storage `slot_` key.

updateExchangePrices(uint256).notice: calculates the updated vault exchange prices

updateExchangePricesOnStorage().notice: calculates the updated vault exchange prices and writes them to storage
